posts.post_content:
I didn't plan on having to sell these Old Judge cards, but an unexpected breakup/divorce is causing me to have to liquidate some of my possessions. The plan was to send these to PSA once they brought prices and timelines back in order, that's why they are in card savers. 

No idea on value, honestly. I hadn't planned on reselling them ever.

So toss me any offers on any of them. If they don't move, they will head to the bay in auction format. 

(pics here)
[url]https://ibb.co/VDDVf5g[/url]
[url]https://ibb.co/6H47Hnz[/url]

[url]https://ibb.co/1Xp7YRJ[/url]

#10 in my pictures: C. Clark is SOLD
#4 in my pictures: Williamson is SOLD
#1 in my pictures: Clements is SOLD
#2 in my pictures: Madden is SOLD
#12 in my pictures: Nash is SOLD

Lots and lots of PM's. 

I got a single one offering a price on a single card.

If no one wants to make any other offers, they will go to a consignor to hit the bay. I tried to be as clear as possible in my initial post. I wanted to give this vintage forum first dibs.

Can you show backs,please?Did you get my PM ?
Ben
Sorry everyone. I have lots of messages to get through. I’m busy at work. I hope to answer questions and take scans tomorrow. Thanks for the patience.

New front AND back scans. I numbered the card savers so it's easier to see which is which on the back as well.


[url]https://ibb.co/VDDVf5g[/url]

Closing this up on Wednesday (7/27/22) at bed time. 

I will be shipping cards to either the buyers, or off to the eBay consignor on Thursday. 

If you have any interest in any of these, send me an offer, or watch for them on eBay in a few weeks. 

Thanks for the offers that I am working through with those that sent them in thus far.

Last Call for any of the remaining 9 cards. Wrap it up tonight.

They will ship to you tomorrow, OR off to be listed on eBay. 

Thanks for all of those that have worked with me thus far.
PM sent for Nash and Madden
Sales are closed. Cards are packed up. Tracking has been sent to those that purchased. Thanks to everyone that participated.
Thanks Nick for a great transaction - Scott

The 7 remaining Old Judge’s are currently on eBay for 2 more days. Consigned via PC Sportscards. 

FYI for anyone that was possibly interested in any of them. Thanks again for those that completed transactions with me.
